treaty_network_strength: Developing treaty program anchored in regional double-tax agreements.
incentives: Headline corporate income tax of 34.0% with tailored relief for reinvested profits and priority sectors.
Export development incentives include accelerated depreciation and refundable R&D offsets.
Digital incorporation pathways keep formation outlays near $530 including standard government charges.
notes: Employers budget roughly 11.4% of payroll for social security and labour funds.
Annual compliance service packages average $830 covering accounting, filings, and statutory audits as required.
Regulators increasingly monitor economic substance and beneficial ownership disclosures for cross-border groups.

foundation_terms.availability: Primarily restricted to charitable purposes with limited ability to own active businesses.
foundation_terms.control_requirements: Regulator approval needed before foundations may influence corporate management.
foundation_terms.reporting: Detailed programme and financial reporting required, often with advance budgeting submissions.
foundation_terms.substance_requirements: Expect mandated local agents and closer supervision of cross-border transactions.
notes: Regulators expect resident trustees and onshore board deliberations for active holdings.
Trans-Tasman transparency frameworks facilitate data sharing on charitable controllers.
Annual governance budgets of roughly $5,000 cover directors, accounting, and regulatory liaison fees.
